name: Gai's Collection (demo-)
description:
A young man named Gai hasn't had much happen in his life. Wanting to be remembered, he seeks out people to tell their stories so he can put them in his book, Gai's Collection. this is a demo

Credits

Yanfly Engine for all plugins and the windowskin

Succubus sprites by Avery

Dragon face by Cronus

Peerce faceset by Verdibona
